CustomField.description: Specifies the maximum file size (in bytes) that will be used for generating a preview. Setting a value that is too high may cause a heap size limit exception. The default value is 2097152 bytes (2 MB).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the maximum file size (in bytes) that will be used for generating a preview. Setting a value that is too high may cause a heap size limit exception. The default value is 2097152 bytes (2 MB).
CustomField.label: Default Big File Size
